text:
この度はご注文頂いた商品の入荷が遅れております。
本来なら遅くても今週中の入荷を予定しておりましたが、
商品在庫希少によりメーカーからの発送が遅延しております。
商品は既にメーカーから発送しておりますが、入荷予定は来週火or水曜日を予定しております。
ご迷惑をお掛けして大変恐縮ですが、商品は必ずお届け致しますので、
何卒ご了承頂けますようお願い致します。
発送の際には改めてご連絡いたしますので、
trans:
We regret to inform you that the arrival of the product you ordered has been delayed.
Originally, the product was scheduled to arrive by the end of this week at the latest,
but due to the rarity of the product in stock, there has been a delay in shipment from the manufacturer.
The product has already been shipped from the manufacturer, and we expect it to arrive by Tuesday or Wednesday next week.
We sincerely apologize for the inconvenience caused, but we assure you that the product will be delivered without fail,
so we kindly ask for your understanding in this matter.
We will contact you again once the shipment has been dispatched,
